about.title: About me
about.para-1: As a front-end developer, I enjoy helping designers and companies to bring their ideas into real life.
about.para-2: If you think I would be a good match for your projects, contact me! I am looking forward to a job in a junior developer position.

skills.para-1: Don't see the skill you need?

portfolio.main-text: You want to see my skills in action? Explore a selection of my work here and interact with my projects.

contact.text: Say hello! Let's discuss your ideas and make it happen.
